attributes.action: Save the National Railway Museum, York from closure
attributes.additional_details: Save the National Railway Museum, York, UK from possible closure due to cuts to the Science Museum's Budget.  This is a priceless tourist and educational attraction whose closure is unthinkable.  It is a vital player in the local economy of York and the wider region.  Give NRM independence and allow it to become a charitable trust to preserve its legacy for the nation.
